## line variable

Timebased version of [add](./dsp.add.md)<!-- -->. Creates a new `Add` gen based on given `start` (default: 0) and `end` (default: 1) positions and tracing a line over `num` steps.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
line: (start?: number, end?: number, num?: number, skipFirst?: boolean, clampEnd?: boolean) => Add
```

## Remarks

Unless `skipFirst` is true, the `end` value is only reached at `num + 1` steps. The line will NOT stop at `end` but continue indefinitely if more than `n + 1` values are requested from the generator.

## Example


```ts
line(0, 1, 5).take(7)
// [ 0, 0.2, 0.4, 0.6, 0.8, 1, 1.2 ]

```
